name: Puzzle Castle
storyline: Adventure is in the air when you storm the gates of Puzzle Castle! Challenge yourself with twelve exciting games, puzzles and activities on a magical, musical multimedia quest to save the kingdom in time for the Grand Banquet! It is an ever changing, fast paced world you'll want to return to again and again!
summary: Puzzle Castle is an edutainment title based on the eponymous book from Usborne. The player takes on the role of Sophie the knight, the only person in the kingdom who is brave enough to find out what monster is lurking deep in the dungeons of Puzzle Castle.
